column4: BRIEF-Microsoft & Trugrid Announce Remote Desktop Protocol Licensing Agreement
column5: * MICROSOFT AND TRUGRID ANNOUNCE REMOTE DESKTOP PROTOCOL LICENSING AGREEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: Microsoft calls for dismissal of U.S. Supreme Court privacy fight
column5: WASHINGTON Microsoft Corp on Tuesday backed the Justice Department's request that the U.S. Supreme Court dismiss a case pitting the two against each other over whether prosecutors can force technology companies to hand over data stored overseas after Congress passed a law that resolved the dispute.

column4: Broadcom completes move to U.S. from Singapore
column5: Broadcom Inc  said on Wednesday it had completed its move back to the United States from Singapore  weeks after President Donald Trump blocked its $117 billion offer to buy Qualcomm Inc  on national security grounds.
